channel.title: Beaverton Foursquare Church
channel.itunes:subtitle: Beaverton Foursquare: Sunday Morning Services
channel.itunes:author: Pastor Randy Remington
channel.itunes:summary: Sometimes you just need a place to go. A place to feel welcomed among friends. A place to find answers to life's most difficult questions. A place to be encouraged to take that leap of faith into the extraordinary life God's Word promises. A place to just be in the presence of God. Beaverton Foursquare Church is such a place, so tune in and enjoy the service.
